Not convinced FB situation is as bleak as described here. My use case: primarily FB groups for various interests. If I leave FB, I lose important source of info about couple of home security cam brands,milkweed & monarch butterflies. @lasersailor @russsharer @MikyDe [link]

@DigestAndroid My S22 is supposed to arrive in early April. I really like size and significantly less weight. Reviewers don't pay attention to how much a phone weighs but like display quality, weight is continually a perceptible factor.

subs.text: February 23

@CatoMinor3 @logseq @Obsidian @RoamResearch @NotionHQ @ScrapboxApp @davewiner @rem_note @KinopioClub How well does @rem_note work on a phone? I want a mobile friendly system that can easily be used on various systems including Android, ChromeOS, Windows and iPad.

@davewiner 's Drummer is designed for desktop use. If the CSS was tweaked it would be useable in portrait mode.

@CatoMinor3 @logseq @Obsidian @RoamResearch @NotionHQ @ScrapboxApp @davewiner @rem_note @KinopioClub How well does @rem_note work on a phone? I want a mobile friendly system that can easily be used on various systems including Android, ChromeOS, Windows and iPad.

February 19
@AdamJMatlock Say it ain't so. But this one pricing move will improve the health of millions.
@lasersailor @TechnicallyTee @SpigenWorld Getting close. Just today got a sim I can use to port in. Slightly hesitant because Pixel is different experience.
@AdamJMatlock But why? LOL
@TechnicallyTee @SpigenWorld Please cover cases for the S22. I have already ordered one (ESR  metal kickstand $18) but will order another in a heartbeat.
@TechnicallyTee Thanks for the data!
@AdamJMatlock @theramalmedia Tradeoff is significantly lower weight. If I need to top off once a day for me it's not a biggie.

@theramalmedia During preorder, Google Fi deal on S22 makes it effectively $500 all in including required four months of service.

Pixel 6 is nice (my daily driver is Pixel 4a 5G) but S22 smaller size and significantly lower weight is appealing. 4 years of updates +  5th year security is cool.
February 18
@BetseyStevenson Hire that person. Good mind, with a  can do attitude, and BE PROUD!
@pkedrosky I fear for our country.
@Heptabase Sounds fresh & interesting. Look forward to when things calm down so I can play around before making a commitment.
@journeydan @jordansvail Samsung's new 4 years of Android updates plus a fifth year of security gets my attention. I was THIS close to ordering Pixel6...

@journeydan I am ordering S22 because I like (!!!) the smaller size and lower weight. I am tempted by iPhone 13 Mini but prefer Android. And the Google Fi deal is decent. $400 with number port-in only have to stay for 4 months so $500 all in. I will keep a Pixel 4a 5G on VZ for now
@lasersailor [link]

The way this works:  you create two or a few accounts and then  buy and sell among them to drive up the price.
